text: Valapattanam railway station (Code: VLPM) is a railway station in Kannur District, Kerala and falls under the Palakkad railway division of the Southern Railway Zone, Indian Railways. Trains that halt at this station include: * Mangalore- Chennai egmore express * Kannur- Bangalore city express * Mangalore- Nagercoil Parasuram express * Mangalore- Trivandrum express == References == Category:Railway stations in Kannur district Category:Railway stations opened in 1904
title: Valapattanam railway station
